title: Rice and Agricultural Development
creator_credit: National Farm Cinema Association of Japan
brief_description: Japan, as the most advanced agricultural nation of Asia, has the experience and technique to help Afro-Asian economies, by improvements in agriculture. As part of this assistance, the Ibaraki International Agricultural Training Centre teaches better rice cultivation to foreign students.z
